item.title: need help look@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:1, topic:324841”]K so this is pvp planet source and i didnt even edit anything and when i compiled i got 17 errors

client.java:17654: illegal start of expression
*/
^
client.java:17654: illegal start of expression
*/
^
client.java:17655: illegal start of expression
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“delta”) && !connectedFrom.equals(“127.0.0.1”) &&
!connectedFrom.startsWith(“adsl-99”)){
^
client.java:17655: not a statement
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“delta”) && !connectedFrom.equals(“127.0.0.1”) &&
!connectedFrom.startsWith(“adsl-99”)){
^
client.java:17655: ‘;’ expected
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“delta”) && !connectedFrom.equals(“127.0.0.1”) &&
!connectedFrom.startsWith(“adsl-99”)){

                                  ^

server.java:293: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
server.java:304: ‘catch’ without ‘try’
} catch (Exception e) {
^
server.java:304: ‘)’ expected
} catch (Exception e) {
^
server.java:304: not a statement
} catch (Exception e) {
^
server.java:304: ‘;’ expected
} catch (Exception e) {
^
server.java:271: ‘try’ without ‘catch’ or ‘finally’
try {
^
server.java:308: ‘catch’ without ‘try’
} catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {
^
server.java:308: ‘)’ expected
} catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {
^
server.java:308: not a statement
} catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {
^
server.java:308: ‘;’ expected
} catch (java.io.IOException ioe) {
^
server.java:265: ‘try’ without ‘catch’ or ‘finally’
try {
^
server.java:316: reached end of file while parsing
}
^
17 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

I cant even edit anything with the errors it doesnt change so could some1 please help[/quote]

Learn to use code tags and also take off the part at the begining of client.java which is / cause it should be / not */ at the beggining it would be */ at the end.

Read full topic
